channel.title: CVE Feed for HasThemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HasThemes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-35699|2024-06-08T14:17:13.386Z -- hasthemes -- ht%20feed
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasThemes HT Feed allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HT Feed: from n/a through 1.2.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-34767|2024-06-07T17:18:08.585Z -- hasthemes -- shoplentor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasThemes ShopLentor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ShopLentor: from n/a through 2.8.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-30182|2024-03-27T11:46:10.227Z -- hasthemes -- ht%20mega
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasThemes HT Mega allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HT Mega: from n/a through 2.4.3.
